2. "effective exciton dissociation"
3. "PL quenching experiment"

In this paragraph, "fibril morphology" refers to the structure of the material being studied, "effective exciton dissociation" is a property of the material that describes its ability to separate excitons, and "PL quenching experiment" is a measurement technique used to observe the property.
